scripts.build:full: pnpm run generate-all && astro check && astro build
scripts.generate-schema: cd .. && cargo run --bin maki-devtools -- generate-schema -o docs/public/schema/v1.json
scripts.generate-config: cd .. && cargo run --bin maki-devtools -- generate-config -o docs/examples/config.json
scripts.generate-rule-docs: cd .. && cargo run --bin maki-devtools -- generate-rule-docs -o docs/src/content/docs/rules
scripts.generate-all: cd .. && cargo run --bin maki-devtools -- generate-all -o docs
